QuestData.Title: Primal Pests
QuestData.Description:
<Cindrethresh glances suspiciously at the proto-dragons lurking on the ridge behind her.>
I'd swear that those proto-dragons edge closer to camp every time I turn my back...
Those are not the dragons Ebyssian invited us here to meet.
Proto-dragons are ruthless predators who cannot be reasoned with. We must be ruthless in return.
Cull their numbers to keep their ambitions in check, or this expedition will be over before it begins.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Primal Proto-drakes on the Wild Coast.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Scalecommander Cindrethresh in Wingrest Embassy.
QuestData.RewardText:
That may dissuade them from attacking the expedition camps for a time.
It's eat or be eaten in the Dragon Isles, $p. You'd do well to remember that.
